snippet: Senator Harry Reid had a painful New Year’s Day, breaking ribs and bones in his face after falling off a piece of exercise equipment in his home.
abstract: Senator Harry Reid had a painful New Year’s Day, breaking ribs and bones in his face after falling off a piece of exercise equipment in his home.

headline.main: Harry Reid Is Hospitalized After Exercise Accident
headline.print_headline: Reid Breaks Ribs and Facial Bones in Exercise Accident
